attributes.action: Stop the rollout of Vaccine Passports throughout the Nation.
attributes.additional_details: It infringes on the human rights act; article 1, 2, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 12, 13, 18, 19, 20, 21, 23, 24, 25, 27. It also forces people in certain positions to lose their employment or take the vaccine. This directly infringes on the Nuremberg Code.
attributes.background: Do not rollout mandatory presentation of vaccine passports for and private sector business. It should be at the owners discression, not the law.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

You might be interested to know that the Human Rights Act does not include any articles 19, 20, 21, 23, 24, 25 or 27. You can read the articles here https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1998/42/schedule/1
